result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Frank Devon Johnson

records.addlTxt: Defendant Frank Devon Johnson in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  Katrina Voge appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Hearing held via zoom. Status conference held.  Atty. Flynn requests a final pretrial and trial date.  Court orders any pretrial documents be filed no later than 48 hours before the final pretrial date. Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Frank Devon Johnson in court with attorney Corey R. Flynn.  
Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Calendar call held.  Court ordered the stayed warrant vacated.  Atty. Flynn has received discovery and an offer and would like time to review.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court via Zoom.  
Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Matter set for pretrial conference.  No appearance by the defendant.  Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed until the next court date.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  Calendar call scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Walmart.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 1 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.

Defendant Frank Devon Johnson in court with attorney Rosemary Cuevas.  Defendant Frank Devon Johnson in custody.  Jon R Josephsen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Frank Devon Johnson appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 1. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/83289ee0-2326-3076-b9a3-4c551cf64527  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Frank Devon Johnson

Prior: 10185 West Coldspring Road, Greenfield, WI 53228

Defendant Frank Devon Johnson not in court.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Initial appearance scheduled for this date 3/18/2022. Defendant is in custody at MPD. Needs to be produced for court.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 3/18/22 @ 2p
